founders.name: Askhat Omarov, Founder/CEO
founders.description:
Became an entrepreneur at 13, since then love creating things that never existed.

Founded multiple successful startups, including one that was acquired and became a $1B business.

At Farel, helping airlines move to next-generation software to serve the world better.

#  The Operating System for next-generation airlines 
Say farewell to piecing together different vendors, integrations, and clunky software. Farel delivers one seamless, all-in-one, software platform engineered for growing airlines. 
[ Get started ](https://farel.io/</request>)
![main image](https://farel.io/static/img/main-image.png?v=2)
## One App to Do It All 
One App to optimize every aspect, from inventory management to departure control, without the hassle of dealing with multiple vendors and complex integrations. Experience the future of aviation software with Farel. 
![main image](https://farel.io/static/img/all-in-one.png?v=1)
## Boost your direct sales with world class customer-facing technology 
Farel's expertly crafted technology maximizes revenue by optimizing conversions, easily turning visitors into paid passengers. 
[](https://farel.io/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/air-farel/id1630126963>)[](https://farel.io/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.farel&hl=en&gl=US>)
[ Demo Website ](https://farel.io/<https:/flypenguin.org/>)
![main image](https://farel.io/static/img/fly-penguin.png?v=1)
#  Turbocharge revenues with multichannel distribution 
Farel's multichannel distribution empowers airlines to sell flights through various channels increasing inventory visibility and revenue streams. 
[ Request Demo ](https://farel.io/</request>)
  * IBE 
Launch a stunning airline website in a matter of days, not months. No coding is required. 
  * Mobile App 
Unlock new revenue in the massive mobile-only travel market with a branded app tailored for your airline. 
  * API 
List your inventory on OTAs, meta-search platforms, and other online aggregators to increase your online visibility and drive bookings. 
  * Agency Platform 
Distribute seamlessly through our travel agency portal, perfect for business travel and offline travel agencies. 


##  Integrated payments platform 
Our payment platform is seamlessly integrated, providing passengers with multiple payment options, from the ground up. 
![visa](https://farel.io/static/icons/visa.png)![mastercard](https://farel.io/static/icons/mastercard.png)![stripe](https://farel.io/static/icons/stripe.png)![bitcoin](https://farel.io/static/icons/bitcoin.png)![ethereum](https://farel.io/static/icons/ethereum.png)![usd-coin](https://farel.io/static/icons/usd-coin.png)
  * All-inclusive price 
Access our entire platform with no extra per-feature fees. 
  * Pay per-passenger boarded 
Straightforward per-passenger boarded based pricing. 
  * No more hidden fees 
No implementation, training and monthly minimum fees. 


#  Pay as you go 
Say goodbye to confusing pricing and hidden fees. Our simplified, pay-as-you-go pricing means we adapt to the unique needs of your airline, not vice versa. 
[ Request Demo ](https://farel.io/</request>)
##  Replace headaches with seamless automation
Save time, reduce costs, and improve operational efficiency with our end-to-end automation of time-intensive operations. 
[ Request Demo ](https://farel.io/</request>)
  * Full / Partial Refunds 
  * Rebookings 
  * Flight Cancellations 


![main image](https://farel.io/static/img/3-blocks.png?v=1)
####  Stay connected and in the know

generated_description:
### Farel: Revolutionizing Airline Operations

**Overview**  
Founded in 2020 and hailing from the vibrant startup ecosystem of Y Combinator's Batch S20, Farel is on a mission to be the **next-generation operating system for airlines**. Located in San Francisco, they've quickly consolidated a dynamic team of nine employees focused on transforming the airline industry.

**The Problem They‚Äôre Solving**  
Airlines have long struggled with a fragmented array of outdated systems that complicate operations, from reservations to revenue management. Farel addresses this inefficiency by replacing those disparate systems with a fully integrated platform that offers a seamless experience for both peak performance and user satisfaction.

**What They Do**  
Farel's all-in-one platform encompasses everything an airline needs:
- **Inventory management**
- **Pricing and revenue management**
- **Departure control**
- **Consumer-facing applications**

The result is that airlines can boost direct sales with cutting-edge technology designed to convert casual visitors into paying passengers. This is especially crucial for growing airlines looking to maximize their potential without the headache of juggling multiple vendors.

**Key Features**  
1. **Unified Interface**: Their software simplifies operations by integrating all necessary airline functions into one user-friendly application.
2. **Multichannel Distribution**: Farel enables airlines to sell flights through various channels, enhancing visibility and revenue streams.
3. **Integrated Payment Solutions**: Passengers can enjoy multiple payment options, with a transparent pricing model that eliminates hidden fees‚Äîairlines only pay per passenger boarded.
4. **Automation**: By automating time-intensive processes like refunds, rebookings, and cancellations, Farel helps airlines save time and reduce costs.

**Target Market**  
Farel is particularly focused on assisting African airlines and startups in their digital transformation journeys, providing them with the tools to succeed in a competitive landscape.

**The Takeaway**  
In essence, Farel is not just about creating another software solution; it‚Äôs about redefining how airlines operate in the digital age. With Farel, airlines can finally say goodbye to outdated systems and hello to seamless, efficient operations.

Explore more on Farel's journey and offerings at [farel.io](https://farel.io).
